roleset.name: eat too much
roleset.note: OVEREAT-V NOTES: Based on temprel data. Relation to eat.01. Eat is a member of VN class eat-39.1-1. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from overeat.01-v)

example.name: arg 0 only
example.text: PRO states that if she overeats, she then has an emesis.

example.name: Arg0
example.text: Britney Spears' ex-husband Kevin Federline has spoken out about his weight battle, blaming his split from the superstar for his overeating.
